column4: This is driving me crazy.  Yesterday, I plug in my USB device, and I can access it in /dev but not otherwise. Finally, I got it configured and working.  Then, since I rebooted, it doesn't even get listed in /dev when I plug it in :(  If anyone can help, I'd really appreciate it.
I don't wanna have to switch back to Windows...
I've tried it in 2 different USB ports.
use 'dmesg' command to obtain some feedback when you plug in a usb device and pay atention to possible errors
thank you!  That illuminated what's going wrong.
